title: Those Years When I Was an Animal - Novel Updates
tags: Beast Companions   Beasts   Childish Protagonist   Cultivation   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   System Administrator   Transformation Ability   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 灵狐舞玉
description:
On a certain day, Yu Qingyu was walking down the street when an egg suddenly dropped down from the sky and hit his head. Since then, he has been bound to an animal counterattack system. He travels to thousands of worlds to change the fates of a variety of animals.

A certain dragon god smiles: “Little rabbit, where are you running off to?”

A panda breaks off some bamboo: “I’ll let you eat it. Don’t be sad!”

The Snake King spits out its core: “I’ll never eat mice again, okay?”

Yu Qingyu can’t understand. Why do all of his counterattack tasks end up with him being pressed down? Sure enough, the system is unreliable.>
